vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.cash (patch_1.sol#72-95) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(subpot) (patch_1.sol#92)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.blockReward should be constant (patch_1.sol#6)
Lotto.blocksPerRound should be constant (patch_1.sol#4)
Lotto.ticketPrice should be constant (patch_1.sol#5)
